rows.label: tlk01000905_msg0001
rows.name:
So this school wasn't always a school?
I never knew!

rows.label: tlk01000905_msg0002
rows.name:
You got all the materials for us and
Mason helped rebuild the building...

rows.label: tlk01000905_msg0003
rows.name:
You even got us some teachers!
It's not a proper school without
teachers, after all.

rows.label: tlk01000905_msg0101
rows.name:
Quiqui-sensei always launches straight
into experiments, and none of them
ever go well. It's a bit worrying...

rows.label: tlk01000905_msg0102
rows.name:
But I love having a Nopon teacher.
They're just soooo cute!

rows.label: tlk01000905_msg0103
rows.name:
And the way they talk, it's so dear
I just can't bear it!
